verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: Back in 1999] , [ARG1: Donald Trump] [V: was] [ARG2: just one of the many celebrities at the Kentucky Derby] . Oh , and VP Al Gore was there that year , too .
Back in 1999 , Donald Trump was just one of the many celebrities at the Kentucky Derby . Oh , and [ARG1: VP Al Gore] [V: was] [ARG2: there] [ARGM-TMP: that year] , [ARGM-DIS: too] .
